sentences.en: Bronchiectasis is usually produced by an untreated lung infection.
sentences.cn: 支气管扩张一般由未适当治疗的肺部感染引起.

sentences.en: Coronary artery an eurysms were found in around 20 % of untreated patients.
sentences.cn: 若未经治疗,约有20%的病人会出现冠状动脉瘤.

sentences.en: If left untreated , the body naturally breaks down those cells, causing anemia.
sentences.cn: 如果不采取措施,红细胞会自发性的被损伤, 最终导致贫血.

sentences.en: If left untreated the condition may become chronic.
sentences.cn: 这种病如果不治疗可能会发展成慢性病。

sentences.en: If untreated, diarrhea is frequently fatal in already malnourished children.
sentences.cn: 若不治疗, 痢疾对已患有营养不良的儿童往往是致命的.

sentences.en: If untreated, the illness can become severe.
sentences.cn: 若不加以治疗，病情就可能会变得很严重。

sentences.en: In its untreated state the carbon fibre material is rather like cloth.
sentences.cn: 原始的碳纤维材料很像布料。

sentences.en: Meanwhile the untreated tumor is still growing.
sentences.cn: 这时未经治疗的肿瘤还继续生长.

sentences.en: Serious diabetes left untreated can lead to major health problem.
sentences.cn: 严肃的糖尿病左未经治疗可能带领主修健康问题.

sentences.en: The sewers collected sewage and storm runoff and discharged it, untreated, into the harbour.
sentences.cn: 污水和暴雨径流汇入下水道后被直接排入海港。

sentences.en: The study did not include an untreated control group.
sentences.cn: 研究并不包括不接受治疗控制的小组.

sentences.en: The untreated skin does not show any metachromatic staining.
sentences.cn: 其它未用药的皮肤区域无染色.

sentences.en: Treatment with cream base and untreated volunteers served as controls.
sentences.cn: 用乳膏基质和未治疗的志愿者为对照.

sentences.en: Untreated diabetes can lead to blindness, loss of limb function, or death.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病未经治疗会导致失明、肢体功能丧失或死亡。

sentences.en: Untreated heat stress can lead to a more serious problem heat exhaustion.
sentences.cn: 中暑后不及时治疗可能会导致更严重的问题,中暑衰竭.

trans.tran_cn: 未经处理的，未加工的，未浸渍的，未得到治疗的
trans.tran_en: harmful substances that are untreated have not been made safe
